com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class ArgumentConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentConstants

  • public final class ArgumentConstants
extends Object
    This class contains short and long options used by the argument in CLI.

      The name of the SASL property that can be used to provide the SASL mechanism to use.
      static String SASL_PROPERTY_QOP
      The name of the SASL property that can be used to provide the quality of protection for the bind.
      static String SASL_PROPERTY_REALM
      The name of the SASL property that can be used to provide the realm for the bind.
      static String SASL_PROPERTY_TRACE
      The name of the SASL property that can be used to provide trace information for a SASL ANONYMOUS request.
      static String USE_SYSTEM_STREAM_TOKEN
      The value to use to read from stdin or write to stdout.
